column1: Likhobory (Russian: Лихоборы) is a station on the Moscow Central Circle of the Moscow Metro that opened in September 2016.
Likhobory station shares its name with a station on the Little Ring railway line and Verkhniye Likhobory
column2: a station on the Lyublinsko-Dmitrovskaya Line. The name is derived from an area north of Moscow along the Likhoborka River. The station's name during construction was Nikolaevskaya
column3: but was changed by the city prior to the opening of the line.
